## AbstractDevice.reverseVertexWindingOrder() method

Set wether to reverse the winding order

**Signature:**

```typescript
reverseVertexWindingOrder(reverse: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

reverse


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

true if the winding order should be reversed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

The default winding order is counter-clockwise.
